section.title: Firefox - Encryption
section.para:
Configure Firefox to use the Transport Layer Security (TLS) cryptographic protocol and disable its predecessor, Secure Socket Layer (SSL) cryptographic protocol. This module also configures the browser to warn users if they enter a website using weak encryption or a website with mixed levels of encryption.
